name: Core API Release 36.4.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you with new features and an improvement.

ADDED.text: In the optional verification workflow, the prevention of SMS verification is now possible.
You can adjust the SessionNotOnAfter attribute in the SAML assertion for federated SSO by contacting LoginRadius Support.

IMPROVED.text: Enhanced Authentication and Management APIs to capture email and UID information in Consumer Audit Logs.
